    opacity: 1;
    transition: opacity .3s
}

    opacity: 0
}

.ui-autocomplete {
    padding: 0;
    border: 1px solid #a9aeb4;
    background: #fff;
    overflow: hidden;
    z-index: 10000003;
    list-style: none;
    width: 422px;
    max-height: 430px;
    max-width: 90%;
    overflow-y: auto;
    overflow-x: hidden
}

ul.ui-autocomplete {
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(12, 0, 0, .25);
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomleft: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 3px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
    position: absolute
}

.ui-autocomplete li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 1px 10px;
    text-align: left;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
    line-height: 26px
}

.ui-autocomplete li a {
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    font-size: 13px;
    text-decoration: none !important;
    color: #000
}

    background-color: #0a246a;
    text-decoration: none !important
}

    color: #fff
}

.ui-autocomplete em {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 700
}

.ui-autocomplete s {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #909090
}

    width: 50px !important;
    display: inline-block
}

}

    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;

    width: calc(100% - 1em);
    min-width: 90%;
    cursor: pointer;
    z-index: 9998
}

    position: absolute;
    top: 14px;
    right: 14px;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0;
    font-size: 2em;

    background-position: center
}

    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity .5s
}

    max-height: 0;
    transform: none;
    transition: padding-top .25s, max-height .25s, opacity .15s
}

    opacity: 1
}

    max-height: 430px;
    height: auto;

    background: #6a148e;
    border: 1px solid #6a148e;
    border-radius: 24px;
    max-width: none;
    max-width: initial;
    padding: .75em;
    width: 100%
}

    padding-bottom: 3em;
    padding-top: 2em

        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        white-space: nowrap;
        margin: 0
    }

    .homepage-browse__list-item .for-medium-and-large {
        display: initial
    }
}

.homepage-browse__list-item::before {
    content: "\e81f";
    display: inline-block;
    font-family: fontello, monospace;
    font-feature-settings: normal;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    font-style: normal;
    font-variant: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 1em;
    margin-left: .2em;
    margin-right: .2em;
    speak: none;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-transform: none;
    width: 8px
}

    color: #6a148e;
    font-weight: 700
}

    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 22px;
    margin-top: 24px;
    padding: 0 .5em;
